lead_developer_questions.title: IoT Gateway Architecture
lead_developer_questions.content:
Bạn được yêu cầu thiết kế một IoT Gateway cho hệ thống quản lý thiết bị công nghiệp.
Gateway này cần kết nối với:
- 50+ sensors (temperature, pressure, vibration)
- 10+ industrial devices (PLC, SCADA)
- Cloud platform qua MQTT
- Local database để cache data

Hãy mô tả:
1. Kiến trúc tổng thể của hệ thống
2. Cách xử lý real-time data từ sensors
3. Strategy để handle network failures
4. Security measures cho industrial environment
5. Scalability plan khi số lượng devices tăng lên 200+

lead_developer_questions.title: Microservices Design
lead_developer_questions.content:
Dự án cần xây dựng hệ thống quản lý fleet AMR (Autonomous Mobile Robots) với các services:
- Device Management Service
- Task Scheduling Service
- Real-time Monitoring Service
- Analytics Service
- Safety Management Service

Hãy thiết kế:
1. Service boundaries và responsibilities
2. Communication patterns giữa các services
3. Data consistency strategy
4. Deployment architecture
5. Monitoring và observability solution

lead_developer_questions.title: Real-time System Design
lead_developer_questions.content:
Hệ thống cần xử lý real-time data từ 100+ industrial devices với requirements:
- Latency < 100ms cho critical operations
- Throughput 10,000+ events/second
- 99.9% uptime
- Support cho multiple protocols (OPC-UA, Modbus, MQTT)

Hãy đề xuất:
1. Technology stack phù hợp
2. Data processing pipeline
3. Caching strategy
4. Load balancing approach
5. Failure recovery mechanisms

lead_developer_questions.title: Team Management Scenario
lead_developer_questions.content:
Bạn là Tech Lead cho team 8 developers (3 backend, 3 frontend, 2 QA).
Dự án IoT Gateway đang gặp issues:
- Backend team chậm 2 tuần so với timeline
- Frontend team không có API documentation
- QA team không có test environment
- Client yêu cầu demo trong 1 tuần

Hãy mô tả:
1. Cách bạn prioritize và delegate tasks
2. Strategy để accelerate development
3. Communication plan với stakeholders
4. Risk mitigation approach
5. Lessons learned cho future projects

lead_developer_questions.title: Technology Decision Making
lead_developer_questions.content:
Dự án cần chọn technology stack cho industrial IoT platform với constraints:
- Budget: 500 triệu VNĐ cho infrastructure
- Timeline: 6 tháng development
- Team: 5 developers (mixed experience)
- Requirements: Scalable, secure, maintainable

Hãy đề xuất:
1. Technology choices với justification
2. Development approach (monolith vs microservices)
3. Risk assessment cho từng choice
4. Migration strategy từ legacy systems
5. Success metrics và KPIs

lead_developer_questions.title: OPC-UA Implementation
lead_developer_questions.content:
Dự án cần integrate OPC-UA với industrial devices. Hãy mô tả:

1. OPC-UA architecture và components
2. Security model (authentication, authorization, encryption)
3. Data modeling cho industrial sensors
4. Performance optimization strategies
5. Integration challenges với legacy systems
6. Testing approach cho OPC-UA connections

lead_developer_questions.title: AMR Navigation & Control
lead_developer_questions.content:
Hệ thống AMR cần navigation và control capabilities:

1. SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) implementation
2. Path planning algorithms cho dynamic environments
3. Collision avoidance strategies
4. Multi-robot coordination
5. Safety protocols và emergency stops
6. Integration với warehouse management system

lead_developer_questions.title: Edge Computing & AI
lead_developer_questions.content:
Dự án cần implement Edge AI cho real-time processing:

1. Edge computing architecture cho industrial IoT
2. AI/ML models cho predictive maintenance
3. Data preprocessing tại edge
4. Model deployment và versioning
5. Performance monitoring và optimization
6. Integration với cloud AI services

software_engineer_questions.title: Real-time Data Processing
software_engineer_questions.content:
Bạn cần implement real-time data processing cho 100+ sensors:

```python
# Current implementation
def process_sensor_data(sensor_id, value, timestamp):
    # Process sensor data
    processed_data = {
        'sensor_id': sensor_id,
        'value': value,
        'timestamp': timestamp,
        'status': 'normal'
    }
    return processed_data
```

Hãy cải thiện:
1. Performance optimization
2. Error handling
3. Data validation
4. Memory management
5. Threading/concurrency approach

software_engineer_questions.title: API Design & Implementation
software_engineer_questions.content:
Bạn cần design REST API cho device management system:

1. Design API endpoints cho CRUD operations
2. Authentication và authorization
3. Rate limiting implementation
4. Error response format
5. API versioning strategy
6. Documentation approach

software_engineer_questions.title: Database Design & Optimization
software_engineer_questions.content:
Hệ thống cần lưu trữ data từ industrial devices:

1. Database schema design
2. Indexing strategy cho performance
3. Data partitioning approach
4. Backup và recovery plan
5. Data retention policies
6. Migration strategy cho schema changes

software_engineer_questions.title: Performance Optimization
software_engineer_questions.content:
Hệ thống IoT Gateway đang chậm với 1000+ concurrent connections:

1. Performance profiling approach
2. Bottleneck identification
3. Optimization strategies
4. Caching implementation
5. Load balancing solutions
6. Monitoring và alerting

software_engineer_questions.title: Security Implementation
software_engineer_questions.content:
Industrial IoT system cần security measures:

1. Authentication mechanisms
2. Data encryption (at rest và in transit)
3. Access control implementation
4. Security audit logging
5. Vulnerability assessment
6. Incident response plan

software_engineer_questions.title: Testing Strategy
software_engineer_questions.content:
Dự án cần comprehensive testing approach:

1. Unit testing strategy
2. Integration testing cho IoT devices
3. Performance testing
4. Security testing
5. Automated testing pipeline
6. Test environment setup

software_engineer_questions.title: Message Queue Implementation
software_engineer_questions.content:
Hệ thống cần message queue cho reliable communication:

1. Message queue architecture (RabbitMQ/Kafka)
2. Message routing strategies
3. Error handling và retry mechanisms
4. Dead letter queue implementation
5. Monitoring và alerting
6. Performance tuning

software_engineer_questions.title: Containerization & Deployment
software_engineer_questions.content:
Dự án cần containerized deployment:

1. Docker containerization strategy
2. Kubernetes deployment configuration
3. Service discovery implementation
4. Health check mechanisms
5. Rolling update strategy
6. Resource management
